gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 133, Mavericks 111
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Mavericks, 133-111. Myles Turner led the way with a season-high 33 points, along with eight rebounds for the Pacers, with Tyrese Haliburton adding 17 points and 10 assists in the victory. Luka Doncic tallied 33 points, six rebounds, and six assists for the Mavericks in the losing effort. The Pacers improve to 33-25, while the Mavericks snap their seven-game winning streak and fall to 33-24.
